  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4596</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Pupil Electrolysis Experiments</string>
            <string language="es">Experimentos de electrólisis para los alumnos</string>
            <string language="ga">Turgnaimh Leictrealaithe do Dhaltaí</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Pupille-Elektrolyse-Experimente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Expériences D'Électrolyse de Pupille</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Experiências Do Electrolysis Da Pupila</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esperimenti Di Elettrolisi Della Pupilla</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πειράματα ηλεκτρόλυσης μαθητών</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Experiment investigating how electricity passing through water can cause a chemical reaction (electrolysis). Includes teachers' notes and solutions to questions.</string>
            <string language="es">Experimento que investiga como la electricidad, cuando pasa a través del agua, puede causar una reacción química (electrólisis). Incluye notas de los profesores y soluciones a preguntas.</string>
            <string language="ga">Turgnamh a fhiosraíonn an chaoi ar féidir le leictreachas a théann trí uisce imoibriú ceimiceach a dhéanamh (leictrealú). Áirítear nótaí do mhúinteoirí agus freagraí ar cheisteanna leis seo.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science</string>
            <string language="es">Ciencias</string>
            <string language="ga">Eolaíocht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Chemistry</string>
            <string language="es">Química</string>
            <string language="ga">Ceimic</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Experiment</string>
            <string language="es">Experimento</string>
            <string language="ga">Turgnamh</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Experiment, das nachforscht, wie die 
Elektrizität, die durch Wasser überschreitet, eine chemische 
Reaktion (Elektrolyse) verursachen kann. Schließt Anmerkungen 
und Lösungen der Lehrer zu den Fragen ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Expérience étudiant comment l'électricité 
passant par l'eau peut causer une réaction chimique (électrolyse). 
Inclut les notes et les solutions des professeurs aux questions.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Experiência que investiga como a eletricidade que
passa através da água pode causar uma reação química 
(electrolysis). Inclui notas e soluções dos professores às 
perguntas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esperimento che studia come l'elettricità che 
passa attraverso l'acqua può causare una reazione chimica 
(elettrolisi). Include le note e le soluzioni degli insegnanti 
alle domande.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πείραμα που ερευνά πώς η ηλεκτρική ενέργεια που 
περνά μέσω του ύδατος μπορεί να προκαλέσει μια χημική αντίδραση
(ηλεκτρόλυση). Περιλαμβάνει τις σημειώσεις και τις λύσεις 
των δασκάλων στις ερωτήσεις.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Chemie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Experiment</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Chimie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Expérience</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Chemistry</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Experiência</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Chimica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esperimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χημεία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πείραμα</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
